std::string mt::XmlConfig::getMandatory ( const std::string &  b  )  const

Get value of the parameter from the XML config's root element.

If no such parameter or the parameter's value is empty than throws exception.

Parameters:
b The parameter's name.
Exceptions:
mt::XmlException if the document is empty.
mt::XmlException if error occurred at initializing the element context.
mt::XmlException if error occurred at parsing the element.
mt::XmlExceptionNoMandatoryParamter if no such parameter.
Returns:
Value of the parameter.
